name: Charming Duplex
summary: Fantastic duplex apartment with three bedrooms, located in the historic area.

reviews.txt: Very helpful hosts. Cooked traditional...
ok, could be better...
fine...
Nice place to be on vacation

You get what you pay for but it’s a good stay. Easily accessible and close to great food spots. Hot water, AC comfy bed and they allowed my dog with no hassle! Recommend if looking for something affordable!

The spot was dirty when we arrived. The filthy apartment had already left a bad taste. There was also no soap in the bathroom and not enough toilet paper. It’s almost like he forgot that we were coming.

name: Light and Airy Bedroom in Camden
summary: Our amazing property has easy access to restaurants, cafes, bars and is walking distance from High Street Kensington where you can find a multitude of retail shops

reviews.txt: Very nice small flat with a sepa'rate' kitchen, office and bedroom/living room (+shower room with toilet). The flat is modern, bright and warm in the winter. The host was responsive and helpful. I recommend!
Good if you can handle heater not working at night and a not so warm shower in the following morning
Amazingly located, with lots of connections with public transport. Very competitive 'price' and well equipped. The host is incredibly attentive. It"s impossible to get it better than this
Perfect for a brief visit to London. Comfy bed and super clean. The host is super accommodating and friendly. Easy transport links to the centre.

my first airbnb experience was very positive the host was very welcoming and friendly the location is perfect for going into london the bus stop to kings cross is just over the road would be happy to stay here again

It was perfect for my one night stay with my girlfriend ! Really practical if you want to visit London as they are bus stops literally everywhere around ! Everything was clean and the host was really welcoming !

name: Great and Cosy London Studio Flat
summary: Gorgeous double room with access to well stocked kitchen, multiple bathrooms and lovely backyard.

reviews.txt: We had a fabulous stay. The host was on hand for anything we needed, met us on arrival and kindly carried out bags up to the apartment. Would highly recommend and will definitely stay again.
This is an excellently equipped and located apartment within 20 minutes of most of the London attractions. It is furnished beautifully and has everything you need to enjoy your stay.

This place is perfect for anyone looking to have a nice stay in Soho. We were really impressed 'by' the quality of the property and it’s location, especially considering the affordability. Amazing value for money!
Really great space, very clean and well presented looks exactly like the pictures. The host is a great host and was available on call if we needed anything.
Very nice apartment. Excellent location and great hosting
Really enjoyed this modern flat, in such a great location. Would definitely stay again!

name: London Bridge
summary: Private room in residential home.

reviews.txt: We had a fabulous stay. The host was on hand for anything we needed, met us on arrival and kindly carried out bags up to the apartment. Would highly recommend and will definitely stay again.
The place was very clean and comfortable! Great location right next to the subway! Better to see the city on foot! Check in was quick and easy. I would definitely stay here again in the future!

The host was an incredible, responsive host and her cosy flat was absolutely perfect. From being greeted with her adorable puppy, to near-immediate responses to our questions, this stay was pretty much perfect. The location and value are unbeatable.
The flat was in a nice area to see the London sites, and right next to an underground station. I’d recommend staying there.

The place itself was very comfortable and the location was incredible, right next to the tube station and very easy to travel anywhere. Also, the pub next door was really good and had amazing fish and chips!
Great place. Would stay again. Thanks!

name: Boutique studio in downtown
summary: This brand new modern high quality studio apartment is in the very heart of downtown Budapest.

reviews.txt: Excellent value and location. The apartment is not so big but big enough for two people. Big plus for the coffee machine with the extra capsules :)
Easy going place, very good access, very quiet, and comfortable
Situated in the centre of exactly where you want to be to explore Budapest. Great places for the evening all around but apartment very quiet surprisingly. Would definitely recommend!
Nice apartment, easy communication, perfect location in the centre of Budapest. Highly recommended!
The place very near the centre, comfortable and big.In the building they are doing renovation works, but it is ok.
Apartment is close to everything (walking distance) to great bars, food places etc.

name: Buda Castle
summary: A unique structure during the Crusader rule in the 11th century

reviews.txt: This place is awesome! What a gem in the middle of the Castle district. I would stay here again.
Perfect place to stay for a few weeks/months. I really enjoyed my stay. The location is amazing.
Absolutely wonderful place to stay! Perfect location and very clean apartment! Everything you need for great time in Budapest!.
Great hospitality and amazing location. Highly recommended!.
Wonderful place. Carefully considered. And helpful. Just be very careful you don’t drop your keys by the front door as they will disappear into the cellar. Yep I did that.
Very nice and clean Apartment. Great location. Good price. Friendly hosts. All in all it was a very nice experience..

name: Koko Castle
summary: A unique structure during the Crusader rule in the 11th century

reviews.txt: Exactly as pictured and described. Great location (if you prefer to be away from the busy area but still close enough to go there), the jacuzzi was great and the lights are a really cool touch. Very private and quiet!
Very nice place, well furnished, warm and silent. The 'bed' is comfortable and the jacuzzi is a great plus. The position is very good. The host is very kind.
Great host, really helpful with all your needs. Plus 'price'/quality of the apartment is amazing.
Fantastic place with unique atmosphere and services, will definitely come back.
What an amazing apartment!!! Facilities and cleanliness were excellent and nothing was too much trouble for the host she helped create a perfect stay.
Amazing contact in the build up and throughout our stay. Great location with a metro just 5 mins walk away. Very quiet. Loved the jacuzzi. And lived Budapest!.

name: Dodo Castle
summary: A unique structure during the Crusader rule in the 11th century

reviews.txt: It is a really cool apartment, very comfy & great design. We loved to stay there. It’s very close to the subway station. It’s very easy to get around by bike & tram.
Perfect place, quiet. Owners are very helpful and they respond quickly. Had a great time!.
Everything was just GREAT!!! Super friendly, the place looks as good as the pictures indicate, it was easy to get to the city center by foot or by bus we had a great time!.

This place always gem been there 3 times you really feel home you will just love it , the owner is friendly professional and very helpful in case of any issue I highly recommended , big full of space clean and full of light.
One of the best place I’ve been in Budapest the service the management and communication everything is on top very high recommendation.
Good location, quiet, clean, comfortable, stylish! Thanks for quick responses!.

name: Buda Boat
summary: A boat house on the Danube River

reviews.txt: It was easy and very close to the local tram/metro. Nothing fancy, but had everything I needed and very comfortable space..
Excellent location,Walking distance to most attractions.safe and quiet.
Home is amazing, excellent location and a supreme host. Will stay here again in the future..
We spent a great time there!, the location is perfect and there are all services and transportation near the apartment..
The accommodation is very clean and quiet, and the location is excellent if you have a preference for Budapest’s “Montmartre” area..
Such a amazing place to stay, it is very close to Buda Castle and to the metro station, easy access to the city centre.

name: Beautiful Paris
summary: Studio apartment in central Paris

reviews.txt: Nice cute place with lots of sunlight.
Great apartment! Great 'host'! A little far from the city center but if that"s ok with you, this is a great place to stay.
The apartment was perfect. The only bad thing was the flat has not lift.
We really enjoyed our stay and found the metro to be close by. Extra bonus was the beautiful piano which really adds to the listing.
Nice cute place with lots of sunlight.
Cosy apartment close to metro station. Everything is present to make you feel welcome and at home.

name: Holiday Castle
summary: A castle from the 16th century near Paris

reviews.txt: Exactly as described! Just remember that it is on the top floor with no elevator and it’s shared. A great place to stay on a budget!
Very cute room! Amazing view and very nice flat, we really enjoyed our stay here.
I had a really good time in the apartment. Hard to find a better deal in an apartment high up.
Location is great, the view from the room is amazing and it"s clean.
Flexible and nice host. The place is just around the corner from Gare de l"est.
Nice guy and roommates. Great location and got some great tips.

name: Mudy Castle
summary: A castle from the 17th century near Paris

reviews.txt: Cozy apartment in a perfect location next to the Eiffel Tower!
The apartment has the perfect location. We were impressed. Only 10 minutes to the Eiffel Tower and great cafes and restaurants everywhere.
Great place to stay in the 7th arrondissement of paris. Well connected, 5 min walk to the Eiffel tower. Stylish apartment and responsive host. Check in was easy. Would stay again.
Very clean and the location is a pretty good, but not exactly close to a metro. Make sure to reach out to the host early to get the check-in instructions.
It was a great place. It was nice, clean, and spacious. The building also had no elevator.
The house was very clean, had everything we needed, Super recommended!!

name: Life in Paris
summary: Boutique apartment in Paris

reviews.txt: This apartment is cozy, clean and bright. We enjoyed our stay here, especially the one minute walk to the bakery.
Cool place, very comfortable! Close to the metro station, there is a bus station just around the corner and the bus takes you directly to the center of Paris!.
The apartment is small, but very cozy and clean. we stayed with a family of four and had a wonderful time in Paris. we would definitely stay here again!
Very clean and the location is a pretty good, but not exactly close to a metro. Make sure to reach out to the host early to get the check-in instructions.
Nice just outside of the center of Paris. Good communication.
Was a lovely apartment in a nice chilled area. Very close to shopping mall and not far to metro/bus stop.

name: Life in New York
summary: Boutique apartment in New York

reviews.txt: the location was awesome, felt safe in the area. nice & spacious for an apartment right near times square! would definitely stay here again :) wonderfully priced as well.
This place is within walking distance of so many places ! Also, it"s located on a street that"s not too too busy, so getting an uber is absolutely no problem at all.
The apartment is very spacious and conveniently located. It was an excellent location for what we needed.
Thank you for the opportunity to stay at your lovely place and explore NYC!
We enjoyed staying here. Nothing fancy but definitely worth it for the price. Would definitely stay here again
excellent location, and great hosts. would recommend to anyone looking to get the most out of visiting the city.

name: My Quiet Place
summary: Quiet apartment in New York

reviews.txt: This place was perfect for my stay. I was in town on a work trip and it gave me the privacy and amenities I needed.
If you need somewhere to stay outside the city, this is the place to go.
The place is clean, easy to access, very quiet and independent.
The place was spotless better than the pictures. Small and intimate, yet spacious enough for a couple.
Close to Times Square, Central Park, grocery stores and restaurants.
Apartment is clean and modern and at a great price point. Apartment was even better than the pictures which normally is not the case.

name: Life-style in New York
summary: Two bedroom apartment with high ceilings and hardwood floors available in a new mid-rise building. This well-maintained elevator building is located in Midtown West, one of the most convenient neighborhoods in all of Manhattan.

reviews.txt: Good location as a base to explore New York, would definitely recommend!
Well located apartment a short walk to Times Square and close to countless restaurants.
The apartment is greeeeeat, amazing and the neighborhood lovely. It’s perfect.
Great hosts and place to stay!
The place was very clean. We loved how close it was to the subway.
Thank you so much for hosting. Will definitely book again when I’m back in NY.

name: New York Castle
summary: This newly renovated, former in-law suite is completely separate from our main house. It has its own private, lockable entrance, separate from the main house, with self check-in.

reviews.txt: Beautiful home, very comfortable, extremely attentive hosts. Would definitely stay again.
Great location and great hosts! Had a great time. Thanks guys!
Very conveniently located a few minutes walk from main street in a quiet residential area. Tons of thoughtful touches like the cozy electric fireplace that greeted us. Highly recommend!
Beautiful place. Steps from the town. Even bigger than it looks in photos!
This place is sparkling clean, has a great 'bed', a very good shower, and is quiet and private. A good place to stay!
we had a great experience. great location. the space is beautiful and clean. the 'bed' is very comfortable. the backyard garden is also very delightful.

name: Holy City
summary: Located 20 minutes from the old city,in a very nice neighborhood with a lot of shopping and restaurant

reviews.txt: Very nice place! Just what I needed. Great location. Very good communication. Would love to stay again.
Great location and great hosts! Had a great time. Thanks guys!
Place was amazing, so clean and easy to talk to host! Would definitely recommend. it is an ideal location for jerusalem!!
Perfect location for our stay in Jerusalem! The host was very responsive and provided great local tips.
I"ve stayed here twice now, and every time it"s a haven while I"m busy! I love the space and the kitchen is perfect!
Great location. Simple and fun. Clean. Comfortable. A very good starter kit about areas around.

name: Palace of David
summary: Located 20 minutes from the old city,in a very nice neighborhood with a lot of shopping and restaurant

reviews.txt: Such an amazing host! And the stay is pretty cozy
Extremely convenient location, very easy to interact with airbnb representative who is extremely responsive, parking a car might be problematic
Very clean, comfortable. Very quiet. Simple but fully adequate for a short stay in Jerusalem. Great location just off Emek Refaim.
Perfect location for our stay in Jerusalem! The host was very responsive and provided great local tips.
A cute little place in a great location. The host was very nice and responsive. Easy check in ad free parking close by. I recommend
small comfortable place, wonderful location.

name: Palace of Solomon
summary: An interior designed modern and sunny 2 bedrooms Luxurious holiday apartment in the center of Jerusalem.

reviews.txt: Excellent apartment and location! Very clean
Lovely, spacious and well thought out apartment. Had everything we needed in a wonderfully quiet and serene neighborhood.
Beautiful place, nice open living room area, lots of sunlight. Modern and clean. Responsive communication. Recommended!
Perfect location for our stay in Jerusalem! The host was very responsive and provided great local tips.
The apartment was exactly as shown in the pictures and great host. That was much appreciated.
Very clean modern apartment. Ex Ellen location. Quiet, sunny.

name: Life in the Holy City
summary: Boutique apartment in the old city of Jerusalem. Everything is right outside your door- shops, restaurants, and nightlife. The train is 2 minutes walk, and everything is within a walking distance.

reviews.txt: wonderful place, amazing view and balcony. Thank you!
if you want to be in the heart of town, this is the place.
Amazing place to stay. The parking, location and apartment is even better than advertised.
Comfortable bed. Great location with walking distance to Old City and Mahane Yehuda.
Great central location. The place is clean and comfortable. It was a great experience.
Amazing place with a great view. Highly recommend.
